post:
Ladies and Gentlemen,

Corgi Tech was established as a Limited Company here in the UK back in 2011 and we're still going strong. We aim to provide first class support at affordable prices across multiple locations around the world.

Our 50% off promotion has been combined with a reduced price Windows OS giving you the opportunity to grab yourself a Windows VPS for as little as $10 / Month for the month of March.

The Locations this offer is valid for are :

  • United Kingdom
  • Netherlands
  • New York / New Jersey
  • Miami
  • Dallas (Very low stock)
  • Phoenix
  • Denver
  • L.A.
Test Files and IP's for each location can be found on our homepage.
Here are the packages:

Basic VPS

30GB of RAID 10 Storage

750MB Dedicated Ram

2 CPU Cores

1000GB Bandwidth

100Mbit 1 Gbit Connectivity (Unmetered Available)

Price: $10 (Windows) $7 (Linux) With PROMO Code: CORGI50

Standard VPS

75GB of RAID 10 Storage

1600MB Dedicated Ram

3 CPU Cores

3000GB Bandwidth

100Mbit 1 Gbit Connectivity (Unmetered Available)

Price: $18 (Windows) $15 (Linux) With PROMO Code: CORGI50

Ultimate VPS

180GB of RAID 10 Storage

3GB Dedicated Ram

4 CPU Cores

6000GB Bandwidth

100Mbit 1 Gbit Connectivity (Unmetered Available)

Price: $31 (Windows) $28 (Linux) With PROMO Code: CORGI50

Operating Systems Available: Windows 2003, 2008R2, 2012, Most Linux flavours, BSD.

You can order from our Website: http://www.corgitech.com

All of our VPS Packages include:

1) Free Weekly Backups

2) Console Access to your VPS with Power Functions

3) VSphere available upon Request

Conditions for this promotion:

This promotion is valid for new orders only, where existing services are not cancelled. It does not apply to domain names/management options/Control Panels. Offer only available for existing clients if current service(s) is/are not being cancelled.
